summary: This document is a financial statement for Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) with UBS, detailing account balances, asset allocations, and performance metrics as of January 31, 2019. It highlights the value of her account, sources of growth, and the financial advisor managing the account. This document contains financial statements for Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) managed by UBS. It details account balances, transactions, and investment performance for January and February 2019, including dividends, interest income, and management fees. This document appears to be a financial statement related to Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) held at UBS. It details account balances, investment transactions, and dividend income for February 2019, highlighting the management of her assets and the involvement of her financial advisor. This document contains financial statements related to Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) at UBS, detailing account balances, asset allocations, and growth over time. It includes information about the management of the account and the financial advisor assigned to it. This document contains financial statements related to Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) for March 2019. It details account balances, income from dividends and interest, and investment transactions, highlighting the management of her financial assets. This document appears to be a financial statement for Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) at UBS Financial Services. It details the account's value, asset allocation, and performance metrics as of April 30, 2019, including a summary of assets and liabilities. This document contains financial statements for Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) for April 2019, detailing account balances, income from dividends and interest, and management fees. It highlights the performance of various investments and provides a summary of cash activities within the account. This document contains financial statements related to Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) with UBS Financial Services. It details account balances, asset allocations, and provides information on account management and growth over time. The document emphasizes the importance of monitoring financial statements for fraud protection. This document contains financial statements for Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) at UBS for May 2019. It details account balances, gains and losses, and investment transactions, including dividends and interest income. The document highlights the management of the account by financial advisors Scott Stackman and Lyle Casriel. This document contains financial statements related to Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) at UBS Financial Services. It details account balances, asset allocations, and provides important information regarding the management of the account. The document highlights the value of the account and includes contact information for financial advisors. This document contains financial statements related to Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) held at UBS. It details account balances, income from dividends and interest, and management fees for the year 2019, along with information about beneficiaries and investment objectives. It highlights the account's performance, including cash balances and investment returns. This document contains financial statements for Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) at UBS for July 2019. This document contains financial statements related to Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) at UBS, detailing account balances, transactions, and asset allocations as of July and August 2019. This document provides a detailed account statement for Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) with UBS for August 2019. It outlines the account's opening and closing balances, income from dividends and interest, and various transactions including withdrawals and fees. This document contains financial statements related to Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) managed by UBS. It details account activity, balances, and asset allocations as of September 30, 2019, highlighting the account's growth and current asset distribution. This document contains financial statements for an Individual Retirement Account (IRA) belonging to Ghislaine Maxwell for September 2019. It details account balances, income from dividends and interest, and transactions including withdrawals and fees. The document also lists a beneficiary for the account. This document contains financial statements related to accounts held by Ghislaine Maxwell, detailing account balances, asset allocations, and growth over time. It includes specific figures for cash, equities, and liabilities, as well as contact information for financial advisors. This document contains financial statements for Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Account (IRA) for October 2019. It details account balances, income from dividends and interest, and management fees, highlighting the financial activities and performance of the account during that period. It details account balances, asset allocations, and growth sources for the year 2019, highlighting the management of her financial assets. This document contains financial statements for accounts associated with Ghislaine Maxwell, detailing account balances, transactions, and investment activities for November 2019. It highlights the performance of her Individual Retirement Account (IRA) and includes information on dividends, interest income, and management fees. This document appears to be a financial statement related to an Individual Retirement Account (IRA) belonging to Ghislaine Maxwell. It details the account's value, assets, and liabilities as of December 31, 2019, along with information about account management and contact details for financial advisors. This document is a financial statement for an Individual Retirement Account (IRA) belonging to Ghislaine Maxwell for December 2019. It details account values, withdrawals, fees, and income generated from dividends and interest, highlighting significant financial activity and management fees. This document contains financial statements for Ghislaine Maxwell's Individual Retirement Accounts (IRAs) held at UBS Bank USA for December 2019. It details account balances, interest earned, and beneficiary information, specifically naming Katie Vaughan-Edwards as a beneficiary. The document also outlines investment objectives and account management details.
